mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.id, a.`name`, a.short_name AS shortName, u.`name` AS unionName FROM `kill` k LEFT JOIN army a ON a.id = k.army_id LEFT JOIN `union` u ON u.id = a.union_id WHERE k.state = 'A' AND k.kill_report_id = #{pid}

SELECT k.id, s.name AS shipName, k.area, k.constellation, k.galaxy, k.num, k.kill_time AS killTime, k.img, k.is_modify AS isModify FROM `kill` k LEFT JOIN ship s ON s.id = k.ship_id WHERE k.state = 'A' AND k.kill_report_id = #{killReportId} AND k.army_id = #{armyId}
SELECT k.army_id AS armyId, a.`name` AS armyName, a.short_name AS armyShortName, k.num FROM `kill` k LEFT JOIN army a ON a.id = k.army_id WHERE k.state = 'A' AND k.kill_report_id = #{pid}
mapper.update: UPDATE `kill` SET kill_report_id = #{killReportId}, army_id = #{armyId}, ship_id = #{shipId}, kill_time = #{killTime}, area = #{area}, constellation = #{constellation}, galaxy = #{galaxy}, num = #{num}, img = #{img}, is_modify = #{isModify}, state = #{state} WHERE id = #{id}
